verse.gurmukhi: kihXhu prI muMidRkw pweI ]5]
verse.unicode: ਕਹਿਯਹੁ ਪਰੀ ਮੁੰਦ੍ਰਿਕਾ ਪਾਈ ॥੫॥

en.bdb: He told her to’ say that she had found it being mislaid.(5)
